subject: Hockey, Ice
Labor and Jobs
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. on Wednesday continued to move toward its third lockout in 17 years, with both the league and the hockey players’ union offering new proposals that the other called insignificant.
snippet: The N.H.L. on Wednesday continued to move toward its third lockout in 17 years, with both the league and the hockey players’ union offering new proposals that the other called insignificant.
